thread.section_title: Half Bottles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Half Bottles | halfbottles.com.au
thread.title: Sandi Smyth
thread.title_full: Half Bottles reviewed by Sandi Smyth

author: Sandi Smyth
title: Sandi Smyth
text:
I have used 'Half Bottles' a number of times and their service has always been great. My most recent order was a little delayed due to a supply issue, the communication from the company was swift and clearly explained the reason for the delay. The order was filled and despatched as quickly as they were able and I could not be happier with their excellent and respectful customer service. I highly recommend this company.
Sandi
